message: Let's make a deal. I get $60, you get $40. It's better to settle now before inflation eats into the value.
I think it's fair to split the money a little more evenly. Let's go with 55 for me and 45 for you.  We can avoid more inflation by settling now.
Bob, my turn.  I'll take the slightly better deal you just tried to give me. It's still better than risking more inflation, right?
